WorkItem.Description: The Optimizer is recommending swapping all gems to +hit. The "Stats" tab correctly indicates that I am 26 points above the hit cap including items, Suppression and Misery.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Optimizer is not correctly accounting for Hit

Comments.Message:
When I open your file and immediately optimize I do not get that problem.  Instead it simply replaces 2 of your SP/Spi gems with straight SP gems.  Are there some extra step I need to take to replicate it?

By the way, do you mean to optimize your personal dps and ignore your pet's?  Optimize for "Overall" instead of "DPS Rating" to include your pet's dps in optimization.

@Jallenrix - it is correct

If you look closely at the optimisation results, you'll notice that 2 pieces of gear were changed:
- [Wand of Ruby Claret] -> [Nightmare Ender] 
- [Loop of the Endless Labyrinth] -> [Ring of Rapid Ascent]

Those 2 items means you 'lost' 74 hit rating (45+29) from gear - so the optimiser recommends the +hit gems to make sure you reach the 289 soft hitcap.

Overall, you got rid of the excess hit (which is worthless when you are hitcapped) and gained +spellpower, +haste & +crit in return. [would be nice if Rawr could print a summary of the stat changes - perhaps in the future :P]
